mapper.sql:
rownum ,seqNo ,msgClass ,title ,content ,linkUrl ,csPhone ,effDate ,endDate ,prePushTime ,pushTime ,pushStatus ,crUser ,crDate ,userstamp ,datestamp from ( select ROW_NUMBER() over (
order by seq_no
order by datestamp desc
) rownum,
) as rownumbertable where rownum between (#{begin}+1) and (#{perPage} + #{begin})

seq_no as seqNo ,msg_class as msgClass ,title as title ,content as content ,link_url as linkUrl ,cs_phone as csPhone ,eff_date as effDate ,end_date as endDate ,pre_push_time as prePushTime ,push_time as pushTime ,push_status as pushStatus ,cr_user as crUser ,cr_date as crDate ,userstamp as userstamp ,datestamp as datestamp
seq_no, msg_class, title, content, link_url, cs_phone, eff_date, end_date, pre_push_time, push_time, push_status, cr_user, cr_date, userstamp, datestamp
mapper.insert: insert into tb_news (seq_no, msg_class, title, content, link_url, cs_phone, eff_date, end_date, pre_push_time, push_time, push_status, cr_user, cr_date, userstamp, datestamp ) values (#{seqNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{msgClass,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{linkUrl,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{csPhone,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{effDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{endDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{prePushTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{pushTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{pushStatus,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{crUser,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{crDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{userstamp,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{datestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

insert into tb_news
seq_no,
msg_class,
title,
content,
link_url,
cs_phone,
eff_date,
end_date,
pre_push_time,
push_time,
push_status,
cr_user,
cr_date,
userstamp,
datestamp,
#{seqNo,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{msgClass,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
#{title,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
#{content,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
#{linkUrl,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
#{csPhone,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
#{effDate,jdbcType=DATE},

mapper.update:
update tb_news
msg_class = #{msgClass,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
title = #{title,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
content = #{content,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
link_url = #{linkUrl,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
cs_phone = #{csPhone,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
eff_date = #{effDate,jdbcType=DATE},
end_date = #{endDate,jdbcType=DATE},
pre_push_time = #{prePushTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
push_time = #{pushTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
push_status = #{pushStatus,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
cr_user = #{crUser,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
cr_date = #{crDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
userstamp = #{userstamp,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
datestamp = #{datestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where seq_no = #{seqNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tb_news set msg_class = #{msgClass,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, title = #{title,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, link_url = #{linkUrl,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, cs_phone = #{csPhone,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, eff_date = #{effDate,jdbcType=DATE}, end_date = #{endDate,jdbcType=DATE}, pre_push_time = #{prePushTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, push_time = #{pushTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, push_status = #{pushStatus,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, cr_user = #{crUser,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, cr_date = #{crDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, userstamp = #{userstamp,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, datestamp = #{datestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where seq_no = #{seqNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}
